channel.title: [PI] Adding a 'Sell 100' option
channel.description: I want to add a 'Sell 100' option I am using PI any help??? PS i dont care if I have to remove 'Sell 10' To do this but if I do (if you know how to do this) can you tell me also how to rename it so it doesn't say sell 10 but you click it and it sells 100 lol -if everything past PS confused you just ignore it its not too important-

item.title: [PI] Adding a 'Sell 100' option
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

[quote=“Ceo123, post:3, topic:384775”]Add This to the end of Client.java

c.value("10") = c.value("90"); }[/quote]
Rawr i tried it a bunch of ways but i keep getting compiler errors be more specific >.> plz lol

[quote]
@IVIr Infiniity
Well, I don’t want a ‘Sell X’ so they don’t sell it to fast I want a limit set.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Adding a 'Sell 100' option
item.dc:creator: @IVIr_Infiniity IVIr Infiniity
item.description:
@IVIr_Infiniity wrote:

Wouldn’t it be easier if you just added a sell x
Do then the player can decide how much he wants to buy / sell ?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Adding a 'Sell 100' option
item.dc:creator: @Ceo123 Ceo123
item.description:
@Ceo123 wrote:

Add This to the end of Client.java

c.value("10") = c.value("90"); }

Read full topic
